page.title: 03THE HOSPITAL, CUCKFIELD
page.content: { Cuckfield Hospital}has 13 wards. Orthopaedic, Surgical, A 5 day ward, Medical, Geriatric, Children's ward and Maternity. The wards are named after Towns & Villages around Cuckfield. There are 1,000 staff and about 10,000 patients are brought to Cuckfield annually. There is a day hospital where Physiotherapy, Occupational therapy and Speech therapy takes place. There is also an Out-Patients department where 120 people go each day. Cuckfield hospital has an active role in the community, offering Anti-natal clinics, Family-Planning, various Therapeutic clinics and working closely with the Welfare Services to provide all kinds of welfare services. Cuckfield is a General and Teaching hospital, taking in both students and 'pupil midwives'.
